TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program: Apollo/Saturn Launch... Kerbal Style... (HD!)

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program: Apollo/Saturn Launch... Kerbal Style! (HD!)

I used the Apollo 11 launch audio here. I simply chopped it up to try to get it to fit the KSP launch and then raised the pitch to make it sound like Kerbals talking. It\'s a funny effect, actually.
ha, your right cause the voices were funny sounding
I liked how it sounded when he said, 'K, we have a roll program!'
